items.content_html: Modular lightweight request library extendable by plugins.
items.title: tramvaijs/request: Modular lightweight request library extendable by plugins.

items.content_html: Lightweight one-way background syncing library
items.title: StyleShit/synctactic: Lightweight one-way background syncing library

items.content_html: A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.
items.title: asilvafx/vite-react-boilerplate:  A lightweight, production-ready boilerplate for React projects built on Vite. This setup includes essential dependencies for modern web development, such as Axios for API requests, i18n for internationalization, and React Router for route management. Includes Tailwind CSS for styling, ESLint for code quality, and support for environment variables.

items.content_html: 🔥 Airbroke: Lightweight, Airbrake-compatible, PostgreSQL-based Open Source Error Catcher
items.title: icoretech/airbroke: 🔥 Airbroke: Lightweight, Airbrake-compatible, PostgreSQL-based Open Source Error Catcher

items.content_html: A lightweight task tracker designed to streamline your workflows
items.title: vvruspat/light-track: A lightweight task tracker designed to streamline your workflows

items.content_html: SelfHost-DL is my project that lets users self-host a simple web downloader with minimal setup. Just run it with Node.js—no third-party services needed. Deploy the files, start the server, and download content easily. Perfect for a lightweight, self-managed solution.
items.title: rdmistra/selfhost-dl: SelfHost-DL is my project that lets users self-host a simple web downloader with minimal setup. Just run it with Node.js—no third-party services needed. Deploy the files, start the server, and download content easily. Perfect for a lightweight, self-managed solution.

items.content_html: This is a lightweight HTTP client based on the built-in fetch, featuring a convenient syntax similar to Axios.
items.title: YAI-team/Echo: This is a lightweight HTTP client based on the built-in fetch, featuring a convenient syntax similar to Axios.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript library to highlight Turkish characters (such as İ, Ş, Ö, etc.) in a string.
items.title: OnurTasci/turkishHighlighter: A lightweight JavaScript library to highlight Turkish characters (such as İ, Ş, Ö, etc.) in a string.

items.content_html: A lightweight library that aims to provide an easier way to interact with the hedera network from a UI perspective
items.title: buidler-labs/hashgraph-react-wallets: A lightweight library that aims to provide an easier way to interact with the hedera network from a UI perspective

items.content_html: SayeriSpace is a modern web app for Sayeri (poetry) and captions, built with React, MUI, Tailwind CSS, and Vite. It features a responsive design, dynamic content display, and a fixed navigation bar. Deployed through Google AppScript, it offers a fast, lightweight, and seamless user experience for poetry lovers.
items.title: kasinath2000/SayeriSpace: SayeriSpace is a modern web app for Sayeri (poetry) and captions, built with React, MUI, Tailwind CSS, and Vite. It features a responsive design, dynamic content display, and a fixed navigation bar. Deployed through Google AppScript, it offers a fast, lightweight, and seamless user experience for poetry lovers.

items.content_html: A lightweight, vanilla JavaScript block explorer for the Cardano blockchain using the Blockfrost API. This project demonstrates building a secure client-server application with real-time blockchain data display.
items.title: Jimmyh-world/Cardano-explorer: A lightweight, vanilla JavaScript block explorer for the Cardano blockchain using the Blockfrost API. This project demonstrates building a secure client-server application with real-time blockchain data display.

items.content_html: 🍰 Lightweight but versatile SVG pie/donut charts for React. < 2kB gzipped.
items.title: toomuchdesign/react-minimal-pie-chart: 🍰 Lightweight but versatile SVG pie/donut charts for React. < 2kB gzipped.

items.content_html: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.
items.title: outerbase/studio: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.

items.content_html: Non official TON based Design System. Inspired by TON Brand Assets and Telegram Community Design System. Includes npm package, design patterns, and detailed wiki for seamless development.
items.title: systemdesigndao/ton-design-system: Non official TON based Design System. Inspired by TON Brand Assets and Telegram Community Design System. Includes npm package, design patterns, and detailed wiki for seamless development.

items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient Notepad Web App built with React (TSX), Vite, TailwindCSS, and TypeScript. It includes essential text-editing features, a status bar, and auto-save functionality.
items.title: rajtilak-2020/Notepad-Web-App: A lightweight and efficient Notepad Web App built with React (TSX), Vite, TailwindCSS, and TypeScript. It includes essential text-editing features, a status bar, and auto-save functionality.

items.content_html: A lightweight React hook for adding snapping functionality to Konva.js elements. It enables elements to snap to stage borders, the center of the stage, and other shapes, with customizable guidelines and snapping sensitivity.
items.title: faridmth/use-konva-snapping: A lightweight React hook for adding snapping functionality to Konva.js elements. It enables elements to snap to stage borders, the center of the stage, and other shapes, with customizable guidelines and snapping sensitivity.

items.content_html: A lightweight development web server.
items.title: akiraohgaki/devsrv: A lightweight development web server.
